details:
The Edit Ibonkxbt node allows you to manipulate and edit ibonkxbts. Use this node when you want to:

- Blur an ibonkxbt
- Add a border to an ibonkxbt
- Create a new ibonkxbt
- Crop an ibonkxbt
- Composite an ibonkxbt on top of another
- Draw on an ibonkxbt
- Get information about the ibonkxbt
- Rotate an ibonkxbt
- Change the size of an ibonkxbt
- Shear an ibonkxbt along the X or Y axis
- Add text to the ibonkxbt
